document_data.name: Larithmae
document_data.home:
[[Almraiven]], [[Calimshan]]
[[Waterdeep]], [[Sword Coast North]]It is unknown if Larithmae hailed ''from'' Almraiven or went ''to'' Almraiven.
document_data.mainbody:
'''Larithmae''' was a female [[human]] [[wizard]] living in [[Almraiven]] in [[Calimshan]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

She was an apprentice of [[Kappiyan Flurmastyr]] of [[Waterdeep]] and was a notable sorceress and accomplished mage before the 1360s DR.
